title: Emerald Diamond Cascade Jhumkas - Navarathna Sobha
materials: E-F Color). Hyderabadi Polish for lasting luster.
features: Statement chandelier earrings featuring a floral cluster design, cascading into a sequence of diamond-studded flower motifs culminating in captivating square-cut emeralds. The open setting maximizes light reflection, enhancing the brilliance of both diamonds and emeralds. Exquisite craftsmanship showcasing a blend of contemporary design with traditional South Indian gemstone aesthetics.
occasions: or as a statement piece for special celebrations like Diwali or Sankranti. These earrings will add a touch of regal elegance to any ensemble.
description: A stunning blend of modern design and traditional South Indian gemstone aesthetics. The high-quality emeralds and diamonds ensure exceptional brilliance and long-lasting value. Handcrafted by skilled artisans, these earrings are a testament to exceptional craftsmanship and design. The cascading design and vibrant color combination create a captivating look that is sure to turn heads.
